h3.a: Extension of Mandated School Closure!! April 17, 2020

div.div: School Closure for remainder of school year.

h3.a: Health Requirements for the 2019-2020 School Year

div.div: Health forms available on District page under Forms tab.

The PORTA Board, Administration and Staff welcomes you to our fine district. PORTA has an outstanding reputation for providing challenging coursework, while balancing multiple extra-curricular offerings that are maintained to meet student interests. We strive to continually maintain a close working relationship with our families and community as we feel educating our children is a community function. We welcome you into our schools as visitors, mentors and volunteers so please feel free to offer your time and effort to help our staff educate our students. Your involvement at home and school will only increase student success while in school and beyond.
The Board has developed a continuous work plan that maps a direction for our district to follow please feel free to evaluate our "work plan" and offer your input to any of our members or myself.
